title: life so hard
body: when you come back to boards after a long time break, see peoples names having colour, finding out they're titles of importance, remember all the times your comments or threads were taken down and realising you'll never get colour :(

replies.body: Meanwhile, i've been on boards for ages, and still no colour XD
u have to git gud i think

https://i.gyazo.com/350100165e43ebe3b45fc4a5356a834a.png

If only....

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2qvZ1RNn,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-08-16T07:11:57.666+0000)
>
> https://i.gyazo.com/350100165e43ebe3b45fc4a5356a834a.png
> 
> If only....

That reminds me of my first take on reworked Yorick. Went something like 0/11/2. Team then told me to either uninstall or never touch him ever again.

I haven't gone back to Yorick since.

Usually Yorick is my Jam, its rare for me to lose lane with him.
But this Wukong had me as his bitch.... 
Full lethality op, it would seem...

The fact that I'm lvl 7 makes it so much more embarrassing xD
You didn't do the right build my friend, try rapidfire cannon & IE :)

Bruh,

No colour is the best colour.

Counterpoint:

And bear with me on this

Purple.

######Before you say anything it's not because my name is Purple. My name is Purple because Purple is the superior colour.
Green is superior because luigi is green :^)
I like green :) But ofc red is my favourite colour so.....

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2qvZ1RNn,comment-id=0003000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-17T01:24:47.071+0000)
>
> I like green :) But ofc red is my favourite colour so.....

Go be a rioter :)
Luigi is king!
Sorry, I'm a special snowflake :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

When you realise I once had 100+ comments deleted and still managed to get a fancy, colourful name.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
were ur messages troll or for being a jerk, because most of mine were for "being a jerk" lol
It was "being a jerk". Mind you, that mod went out of their way to find my comments and delete them (all because of one thing I said), which isn't standard procedure.
hahaha thats hilarious and spiteful :D do you have any special perks with purple text?

You mean like having a purple name or?

No. All I got is the name.

And it is worth it.
Where can i find out about the colours so i can figure out which one i want

You can check out the threads regarding the specific types of volunteers, though they don't say anything about the "perks" you'd receive (excluding the coloured names, obviously). As far as I'm aware, all we have on OCE are [Emissaries](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries) (green), [Instructors](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/RaWrI4Hi-introducing-the-instructors) (blue), [Wrenchmen](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen) (yellow) and [Distinguished Members](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/GLk0EEmq-introducing-the-distinguished-members) (purple).
Rekt.
